documents.document: I'm totally enthralled by marvellous #actuallivingscientist and their research. Hope for our world... Very cool.
@Mad_PhD All best wishes & a wonderful career!
@GeeNonterah @drmikeographer I worked a few years as nurse in premi nursery - important research you're doing.
Too good. Simply too good! First class. https://t.co/1Vq0CQqXZ3
@bradfordlit @SidecarDoughnts Near where I live is place which has best-seller favourite: maple-bacon doughnut, marvellous!
@GrayFishLab Such important work.
@icfmaps Very cool work!
People - you need to scan tweets #actuallivingscientist Impressive & fascinating #science research. Uplifting in this era. ðŸ¤—
Oh dear it's #snowing yet again!! Luckily I'm inside listening to Rigoletto on @cbcr2opera , from the Met. Superb!
@MeanwhileinCana This made me laugh out loud! So cheesy...
@GenealogyJen @jkmorelli Jill definitely gave me several tips on searching for more info on two individuals in family tree. Worthwhile. ðŸ¤—
@bchydro @NEWS1130 Thanks so much for the hard work done in such crappy weather. Much appreciated. (my area never lost power)
My canary is singing up a storm to Rigoletto on @cbcr2opera from the Met. And it's #snow outside. #PerfectDay
@ShamrockGen Gorgeous cards, Melanie! Woo-hoo!! All the best to you. ðŸ¤—
@liamstack @yonatanzunger @DerSPIEGEL Wow. Could they be any clearer-?!
@RayneHall Well, I do have two screens, so that helps in scanning down the columns. I suspect you're busier than I am... ;)
Another snowfall this a.m. - abt 5cm or so. And I'm listening to truly sublime #music "The Lark Ascending" on @CBCTempo @JulieNesrallah
A #genealogy morning - here's my 9th great-grandfather, Nathaniel MERRILL, early New England immigrant: https://t.co/ucGvj5St2U
@artologica These are truly amazing! No $$ right now, but... really, I love them.
@MarkHarrisNYC @jonrosenberg @SamGrittner Quebec shooter WHITE young man, Muslims were VICTIMS. How make political hay from that info?
@washingtonpost No life lost by listed citizens'countries. No catastrophe happening. No crisis. Draconian sloppy # EO "because he could".
@CBCNews Terrible... That poor woman.
@bridgettmorigna We should all be writing... We have important things to say. This the season to say them.
@_LisaStevenson #rwagvc Another winner!! https://t.co/ZkqK5xX5eL
@_LaurelGreer @CarlyASilver @HarlequinBooks Absolutely FANTASTIC news!! Congratulations on seeing the results of your persistence!! So cool.
@leprchaunrabbit Darn... Now I REALLY wish I were going!
@RogueNASA @BI_contributors The effect of constant draining from aquifers. More damage will show...

My very LEAST productive 48 hours... This crazy train wreck going on in States, spilling over... #MuslimBan #StandUpToTrump #needHero
@CBCNews Apparently he did. not. read. the. details. Smack him up the back of his head, someone, eh?!
Gleeful bunch of immoral bullies & small-minded wealthy white men. Power & corruption. https://t.co/9LMoyUkS5d
@AuthorBJackson Fanning face... Whew!
@jannarden He doesn't read. Anything. Obviously he missed that the Muslim people praying were victims of terrorism. Double-Sigh.
@AndreaWoo Amazing amateur juvenile actions. (gives head a shake).
@lizl_genealogy Damn... Too good to be true, eh,? Sigh.
@RayneHall. I totally love using TweetDeck. Lets me keep #Genealogy #Writers #science etc tweets separate. Fast to skim/read, focus.

@CraigRozniecki "Spicer unclear on the concept" So foolish a response from him. @jobourne
An enormous crack is opening up more and more - one of many being monitored closely. Cause: aquifer drawdown. https://t.co/gdqABD89uq
@Debbie83 White entitlement at it's most blatant. Ignores data, goes for fear-mongering replies. @KellyannePolls
@rabihalameddine One of my very favourite designs, images. Thank you for posting it with these colours. Artistry...
@JulieNesrallah Good for you!! Whatever it takes... shine a little light...
Back to #genealogy research - learning from past, finding strengths everywhere. Listening to #classicalmusic @cbcradio #feedingsoul
A little #science #wonder is good for your brains/soul. From @deepseanews - Bone-eating worms!! https://t.co/IC1Z2vFmv0

@WFKARS @yayayarndiva So there will be epidemics of: Polio, Whooping Cough, German measles, Measles, Diphtheria... Senators as Drs. Nope.

This morning, #Canadian History Roundup, week of January 22, 2017 by @AndreaEidinger blog Unwritten Histories: https://t.co/JZo4vmGHrw
@JennGraves1 That's a broad assumption. I'm aware of Pro-Choice women who chose NOT to abort babe w. sp.needs. Choice means: choice.
@AnneWHilborn Fast freeze...Disastrous.

@lizl_genealogy Ditto. Going... going... (waves, bye!)
. @lizl_genealogy Looks like a huuuge train wreck about to happen south of border. Hard to turn away. :( Study on, Liz. Best wishes.
Enough of #twitter and the Dumpster south of border. Time for #genealogy and #writing #revising #romance. New reality, safe place.
@SallyOnTheGo Cheering you on from the sidelines... This too shall pass...
@SallyOnTheGo Does not sound like fun. Smelling coffee beans clears the nose, by the way. Empathy... :)
. @SallyOnTheGo How many garbage bags are you bringing in?? I used 5 one time, put them on back porch... (hit my limit) Gets better!
@Craken_MacCraic @echinoblog @intelligencer Yeah, well... you know... science is just one of those inconvenient theories (satire)
Oy oy oy... do they understand NOTHING? Sigh. Someone go hack them and see what's up. https://t.co/dYUQIsA83u
@kcdyer Think I'm using "bodach" for the Dumpster down south. Fits, eh? Great words here in this list...
@goodreads Secrets will out.
. @ScottWx_TWN - I lost 6 foggy years trying to cope with severe depression. #bellletstalk giving 5cents to #MentalHealth Canada.
Chronic depression, schizophrenia, PTSD, and more : 5cents/tweet from #bellletstalk to #Mentalhealth initiatives in Canada.
Today, throw a nickel in the #Mentalhealth bucket - tweet/retweet using #bellletstalk all day in Canada! C'mon - throw another one in...
@KMWeiland abt 5 pages from The End.
. @bridgettmorigna Absolutely. Art, nature, marine life, and more... good for our #MentalHealth initiatives. #bellletstalk 5cents/tweet
. #bellletstalk Chronic depression is not 'sadness' - it's deep in the bone, can't be addressed by 'simple solutions' e,g, go for walk
t's #BellLetsTalk day. Bell will donate 5cents to #Mentalhealth initiatives in Canada with each Tweet. Let's add them to $$$. Steps. Tweet!

A very productive day: 3 hrs #genealogy client work; #genealogy blog post; & 940 words #amrevising Forgot to eat. Omelette coming.
